text_en: Pelé scored one thousand two hundred eighty-two goals in one thousand three hundred sixty-three official matches.
text_pt: Pelé marcou 1.282 gols em 1.363 jogos oficiais.

text_en: Cristiano Ronaldo has over eight hundred ninety goals in official matches.
text_pt: Cristiano Ronaldo tem mais de 890 gols em partidas oficiais.

text_en: Lionel Messi has scored over eight hundred goals in his career.
text_pt: Lionel Messi marcou mais de 800 gols na carreira.

text_en: Usain Bolt ran 100 meters in nine point five eight seconds (world record).
text_pt: Usain Bolt correu os 100m em 9,58 segundos (recorde mundial).

text_en: Usain Bolt ran 200 meters in nineteen point one nine seconds (world record).
text_pt: Usain Bolt correu os 200m em 19,19 segundos (recorde mundial).

text_en: Michael Phelps won twenty-three Olympic gold medals.
text_pt: Michael Phelps ganhou 23 medalhas de ouro olímpicas.

text_en: Michael Phelps has twenty-eight Olympic medals in total.
text_pt: Michael Phelps tem 28 medalhas olímpicas no total.

text_en: Kobe Bryant scored thirty-three thousand six hundred forty-three points in the NBA.
text_pt: Kobe Bryant marcou 33.643 pontos na NBA.

text_en: LeBron James is the all-time leading scorer in the NBA with forty thousand four hundred seventy-four points.
text_pt: LeBron James é o maior pontuador da NBA com 40.474 pontos.

text_en: Serena Williams won twenty-three Grand Slam singles titles.
text_pt: Serena Williams venceu 23 títulos de Grand Slam em simples.

text_en: Roger Federer won twenty Grand Slam titles.
text_pt: Roger Federer venceu 20 títulos de Grand Slam.

text_en: Novak Djokovic won twenty-four Grand Slam titles.
text_pt: Novak Djokovic venceu 24 títulos de Grand Slam.

text_en: Tom Brady won seven Super Bowls.
text_pt: Tom Brady venceu 7 Super Bowls.

text_en: Simone Biles has seven Olympic medals, including four gold.
text_pt: Simone Biles tem 7 medalhas olímpicas, incluindo 4 de ouro.

text_en: Eliud Kipchoge ran a marathon in one hour, fifty-nine minutes, forty seconds (first under two hours).
text_pt: Eliud Kipchoge correu uma maratona em 1h59min40s (primeiro abaixo de 2h).

text_en: The marathon world record is two hours, one minute, nine seconds (Eliud Kipchoge, 2022).
text_pt: O recorde mundial da maratona é 2h01min09s (Eliud Kipchoge, 2022).

text_en: Tiger Woods won fifteen Majors in golf.
text_pt: Tiger Woods venceu 15 Majors no golfe.

text_en: Martina Navratilova won fifty-nine Grand Slam titles.
text_pt: Martina Navratilova ganhou 59 títulos de Grand Slam.

text_en: Wayne Gretzky scored eight hundred ninety-four goals in the NHL.
text_pt: Wayne Gretzky marcou 894 gols na NHL.

text_en: Diego Maradona played ninety-one times for Argentina and scored thirty-four goals.
text_pt: Diego Maradona jogou 91 vezes pela Argentina e fez 34 gols.

text_en: Neymar Jr. has over four hundred goals in his career.
text_pt: Neymar Jr. tem mais de 400 gols na carreira.

text_en: Kylian Mbappé scored three goals in the 2022 World Cup final.
text_pt: Kylian Mbappé marcou 3 gols na final da Copa do Mundo de 2022.

text_en: Muhammad Ali was heavyweight world champion three times.
text_pt: Muhammad Ali foi campeão mundial dos pesos-pesados 3 vezes.

text_en: Carl Lewis won nine Olympic gold medals.
text_pt: Carl Lewis ganhou 9 medalhas de ouro olímpicas.

text_en: Ian Thorpe won thirteen medals at the World Swimming Championships.
text_pt: Ian Thorpe conquistou 13 medalhas no Mundial de Natação.

text_en: Michael Phelps competed in twenty-eight Olympic events in his career.
text_pt: Michael Phelps nadou em 28 provas olímpicas ao longo da carreira.

text_en: LeBron James has over eleven thousand rebounds and ten thousand assists.
text_pt: LeBron James tem mais de 11.000 rebotes e 10.000 assistências.

text_en: Kobe Bryant scored eighty-one points in a single game (2006).
text_pt: Kobe Bryant marcou 81 pontos em um único jogo (2006).

text_en: Usain Bolt reached forty-four point seven two kilometers per hour in the 100m race.
text_pt: Usain Bolt atingiu 44,72 km/h na corrida dos 100m.

text_en: Cristiano Ronaldo is the all-time top scorer in UEFA qualifiers.
text_pt: Cristiano Ronaldo é o maior artilheiro da história das eliminatórias da UEFA.

text_en: Messi has over three hundred fifty assists in his career.
text_pt: Messi tem mais de 350 assistências na carreira.

text_en: Djokovic has spent over four hundred weeks as world number one.
text_pt: Djokovic passou mais de 400 semanas como número 1 do mundo.

text_en: Serena Williams has thirty-nine Grand Slam titles in total (singles, doubles, mixed).
text_pt: Serena Williams tem 39 títulos de Grand Slam no total (simples, duplas e mistas).

text_en: Tom Brady has over eighty-nine thousand passing yards in his career.
text_pt: Tom Brady tem mais de 89.000 jardas lançadas na carreira.

text_en: Eliud Kipchoge won the London Marathon four times.
text_pt: Eliud Kipchoge venceu a Maratona de Londres 4 vezes.

text_en: Tiger Woods won The Masters five times.
text_pt: Tiger Woods venceu o Masters 5 vezes.

text_en: Simone Biles has seven gold medals at the World Gymnastics Championships.
text_pt: Simone Biles tem 7 medalhas de ouro no Mundial de Ginástica.

text_en: Pelé won three World Cups with Brazil (1958, 1962, 1970).
text_pt: Pelé foi campeão mundial 3 vezes com o Brasil (1958, 1962, 1970).

text_en: Cristiano Ronaldo played over two hundred matches for the Portuguese national team.
text_pt: Cristiano Ronaldo jogou mais de 200 jogos pela Seleção Portuguesa.

text_en: Usain Bolt won eight Olympic gold medals.
text_pt: Usain Bolt venceu 8 medalhas de ouro olímpicas.

text_en: Michael Phelps won eight gold medals at Beijing 2008.
text_pt: Michael Phelps venceu 8 medalhas de ouro em Pequim 2008.

text_en: Kobe Bryant wore jerseys number eight and twenty-four in the NBA.
text_pt: Kobe Bryant usou as camisas 8 e 24 na NBA.

text_en: LeBron James entered the NBA at eighteen years old.
text_pt: LeBron James entrou na NBA com 18 anos.

text_en: Neymar has over one hundred goals for the Brazilian national team.
text_pt: Neymar tem mais de 100 gols pela Seleção Brasileira.

text_en: Djokovic won ten Grand Slam titles in Australia.
text_pt: Djokovic venceu 10 títulos de Grand Slam na Austrália.

text_en: Serena Williams has over eight hundred wins in her career.
text_pt: Serena Williams tem mais de 800 vitórias na carreira.

text_en: I received seventy-two thousand four hundred eighty-five reais this month.
